goal:
Ciruna aims at developing and escorting processes for resource efficiency and sustainability. As Pan - European think thank, Ciruna collects experts and advisors on the topics of interest, delivering high quality contributions for policy - makers and citizens.
Discussions, meetings and working groups are focused on the development of two core activities: firstly, Ciruna encompasses the creation of policy guidances, white papers, publications and users' guides approaching energy efficiency, efficacy and sustainability with a circular regional living lab perspective. Secondly, Ciruna think thank committs to deliver on - time and on - quality consultancy services to private organizations (i.e. SME energy auditing and sustainability certificate) and to public organizations (i.e. among others, SEAP transition consultancy and citizens' involvement strategies).
Ciruna forecasts also the realization of EU project proposal applications, targeting innovative ideas and fostering trans-national cooperation. Ciruna aims at involving the target groups to a great extent, by the means of testimonials participation, city - citizens speed dating, European week attendances and other type of public events.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Big data, Privacy, energy efficiency (EE), Renewable Resources (RES),smart grid, eco-innovation, Living lab (LL), blockchain, Circular Economy (CE), H2020 policy, ERDF policy
